NAME: Bluetooth Car FM Transmitter - LED Display, EDR, A2DP, Noise Reduction, Call Echo Cancellation, USB Output, Micro SD Slot
DESCRIPTION:
Key Features...
  • Bluetooth with A2DP for streaming music and hands free calls in your car
  • Call Echo Cancellation and Noise Reduction brings clear crisp quality audio
  • USB output of 5V 2.5Amp provides power to other devices as you need
  • Answer, hang up, reject and redial from one button so you never need to take your eyes of the road

This Bluetooth Car FM Transmitter lets you wirelessly connect your phone to the cars FM stereo, receive and make hands free calls all while providing USB charging for your phone.

Bluetooth Car FM Transmitter


Do you long for the convenience of wireless connectivity in your car? Wish you could take calls hands free and share music from your phone without having to pay out for a new car stereo? If so the Car G7 wireless Bluetooth FM transmitter is exactly what you need.

Powered through your cars lighter socket this compact car accessory uses Bluetooth technology to your phone to your car stereo without the need for extra cables or wires.

Transmitting across the 87.5-108 MHz FM frequencies its easy to tune the G7 FM transmitter to your car stereo by selecting any unused frequency in your area.

A2DP Bluetooth support lets you stream audio content between the transmitter and your phone while maintaining great quality. This is then send out via FM frequencies and can be picked up directly by your FM car stereo, allowing you to share your phones music library and answer calls hands free in the comfort of your car.

A built in hi quality mic picks up clear audio from 2 meters away with low distortion and the Eco cancellation and noise reduction let you communicate clearly while keeping both hands on the road. A one button control makes answering, dialing and hanging up calls quick and simple making it easy to use without taking your eyes of the road.

With USB and micro SD ports you have extra ways to add music to your car or with a 5V 2.5 Amp output you can use this |USB port to keep your phone or other devices full charged when on the road.

This Bluetooth Car FM Transmitter comes with a 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale car chargers and accessories.
